Displays a list of MediaFile (The Class representing a playable Music title with all its properties) added from the Titles Activity in a ListView grouped by the MediaFile.album property. Titles Activity scans for Music Files on the SD-Card music folder.

Try it .... and when you look at that code, you will find that it\'s fairly easy to fetch additional Info such as Albums and what-have you, presumed the File provides this Info.
